output: html_document

```{r load-packages}
library("ggplot2")
```



# Load in data
```{r load-data}
data <-read.csv("data/Dataset_S1.txt")
#View data
head(data)
```


#Plot data
```{r plot-gc}
# Rename GC column
colnames(data)[12] <- "percent.GC"

#Bin data into 5 bins
data$GC.binned <- cut(data$percent.GC, 5)

#Plot it
ggplot(data) + geom_bar(aes(x=GC.binned))
```
